short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search across Google, DuckDuckGo, YouTube, Bing and more with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instructions:
1. You must use a search engine to do your search.
2. While on a search engine, click the Search It All chrome extension icon to see a list of search engines.
3. Navigate to any search engine by clicking on it.

Support

Do you require assistance? Start a conversation at the lower right corner of https://bigbeartechworld.com
